sent.orig: The powerful Audio Volume Control includes-on Initial volume function, 32-Level Audio Volume Control and Mute Control.
sent.trans: 功能强大的音量控制系统包括开机启动音量功能、32级音量控制以及静音控制。

sent.orig: Bed volume refers to the volume of solution equivalent to the resin volume in place.
sent.trans: 床体积是指溶液的体积相当于树脂量到位。

sent.orig: Statistics includes: Produced volume, treated volume and discharged volume.
sent.trans: 包括三部分内容：产生量、去除量和排放量。

sent.orig: Planned business volume: call-out business volume planned to achieve.
sent.trans: 计划业务量：计划呼出的业务量。

sent.orig: The volume mount point already exists. Deleting and recreating volume mount point.
sent.trans: 卷装载点已经存在。正在删除和创建卷装载点。
